author: Melanie Grayce West
title: De Blasio Presses Albany to Extend Speed Cameras in School Zones
text:
New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio urged lawmakers in Albany to act quickly to ensure that a current law allowing speed cameras in school zones won’t expire in July, while also unveiling a new street design for a busy and dangerous Brooklyn road.
Speaking on Wednesday at the site of a deadly collision in March that killed two small children and injured two mothers—including one who was pregnant and then subsequently suffered the death of her unborn daughter later in her pregnancy—Mr. de Blasio, a Democrat, said that the city...
